mapper.select: /* SQL ID : select 설 명 : 사용량 로그 검색 */ SELECT ORG_CD as orgCd , DIV_CD as divCd , SAVE_DTTM as saveDttm , USE_SIZE as useSize FROM TB_LOG_USE_SIZE_LOG WHERE ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND DIV_CD = #{divCd} AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY SAVE_DTTM DESC
/* SQL ID : selectAtchSize 설 명 : 첨부 파일의 사이즈 */ SELECT SUM(FILE_SIZE) AS useSize FROM tb_sys_file WHERE ORG_CD = #{orgCd}
